title: SAS Trooper Explains The Difference Between Special Air Service, SBS & Navy SEALS | Who Dares Wins

transcripts.text: I'm just gonna ask you a question sorry if it sounds a bit cliche but it's just I'm aware of my American audience who will want to know what is the difference you know what is the difference between the Navy SEALs and say the essay and the SAS

well there's a number there's a number of differences one would be so isn't it I'll describe what we are and then I'll describe what I think Navy SEALs are to to to make that distinction but certainly and of course another another thing to remember is the SAS or army and yes the SBS and the Navy SEALs are a Navy just uh just so I'd clear that up for people who didn't know
